# FeatureSet.LineMarkerPositions

**Structure**

Which ends of an line can have arrows.

## Declaration

```swift
struct LineMarkerPositions
```

## Type Properties

- **all**: All possible combinations of marker positions.
- **double**: Both the start and end of a line has a marker.
- **plain**: Neither end of a line has markers.
- **single**: Either the start/end of a line has a marker.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Hashable
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
